features: Protect a laptop up to 15.6" and a tablet up to 10.5" in the dedicated, padded compartment with a soft-lined pocket
Keep a phone or glasses safe in the soft-lined protective pocket
Main compartment organization includes a file pocket and multiple storage pockets for accessories
Secure smaller loads using the compression straps or attach additional items to the exterior lash points
Keep cables and keys separate and easy to find in the internal zipped mesh pocket
Quickly access go-to items in the vertical front pocket
Store small items or a laptop cable in the zipped side pocket and fit a water bottle in the expandable open side pocket
Securely attach backpack to rolling luggage with the pass-through strap
Constructed with durable, water-resistant materials, custom metal accents, and YKK zippers
Carry in comfort with padded backpanel with airmesh materials and a padded carry handle
